#include <iostream>
using namespace std;

int main() 
{
    int t, n, run = 1;
    cin >> t;
    
    while(t-- > 0)
    {
        cin >> n;
        
        int Ar[n];
        
        for(int i = 0;i < n;i++)
        {
            cin >> Ar[i];
        }
        
        for(int i = 0;i < 3;i++)
        {
            int index = i;
            
            for(int j = i + 1;j < n;j++)
            {
                if(Ar[index] < Ar[j])
                {
                    index = j;
                }
            }
            
            int temp = Ar[i];
            Ar[i] = Ar[index];
            Ar[index] = temp;
        }
        
        cout << "Case " << run++ << ": ";
        cout << Ar[0] + Ar[1] + Ar[2] << endl;
    }
	
	return 0;
}
